coreAttributes.name: ragged skirt
coreAttributes.description: A particularly crude and ragged skirt. Even the most destitute and disadvantaged residents of Dominion wouldn't be seen dead in this.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the ragged skirt and [npc.verb(pull)] it up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the ragged skirt, before pulling it up around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the ragged skirt, before yanking it up around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] ragged skirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] ragged skirt, before slipping it off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] ragged skirt, before yanking it off.
